import{applyMiddleware,combineReducers,compose,createStore}from"redux";import profileReducer from"./profile-reducer";import dialogReducer from"./dialogs-reducer";import usersReducer from"./users-reducer";import loginReducer from"./login-reducer";import thunk from"redux-thunk";import{reducer as formReducer}from"redux-form";import appReducer from"./app-reducer";var reducers=combineReducers({profileReducer:profileReducer,dialogReducer:dialogReducer,usersReducer:usersReducer,loginReducer:loginReducer,form:formReducer,appReducer:appReducer});// let store = createStore(reducers, applyMiddleware(thunk));
var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var store=createStore(reducers,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunk)));window.store=store;export default store;
